long_description: Enjoy a good night's sleep on the sturdy Byer Allagash Plus cot. It's a great choice for car camping and trips to the cabin. Steel legs offer both strength and flexibility, allowing the cot to conform to your body for a great night's sleep. Plus version of the cot features a double-reinforced center panel that is double stitched for support and comfort. Heavy-duty polyester cover is both mildew- and slide-resistant; cleans up with soap and water. Byer Allagash Plus cot folds down in center for storage; legs become a handle for carrying when stored in sleeve and attached with included rip-and-stick straps.
short_description: Enjoy a good night's sleep on the sturdy Byer Allagash Plus cot. It's a great choice for car camping and trips to the cabin.
